blocks.name: abliso
blocks.content: The image of an Abelian group by a group isomorphism is also Abelian. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm abliso(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wcel(c2, cabl))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wcel(c2, cabl), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c2, ccmn))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wcel(c2, ccmn), wcel(c2, cmnd), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wcel(c2, cmnd), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  grpmnd(c2)
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))))
  3eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)))), cfv(c1, cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  fveq2d(c1, cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1))), cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1))), cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))), co(cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wceq(co(cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  ffvelrnd(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  ffvelrnd(ccnv(c1), cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wf(ccnv(c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  3syl(wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2)), wf(ccnv(c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c0)), wf1o(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wf1o(ccnv(c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  f1ocnv(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2))
  f1of(ccnv(c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c0))
  ablcom(c0, cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wceq(cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs1)))), wcel(ccnv(c1), co(c2, cghm, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  ghmlin(ccnv(c1), c2, c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wceq(cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))), co(cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)))), wcel(ccnv(c1), co(c2, cghm, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wcel(ccnv(c1), co(c2, cghm, c0)), wcel(ccnv(c1), co(c2, cgim, c0)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(ccnv(c1), co(c2, cgim, c0)))
  gimcnv(c1, c0, c2)
  gimghm(ccnv(c1), c2, c0)
  ghmlin(ccnv(c1), c2, c0, cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)))), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1))), wf1o(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  grpcl(c2, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  f1ocnvfv2(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(ccnv(c1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0))), wf1o(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wf1o(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  gimf1o(c1, c0, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  syl(wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c1, co(c0, cghm, c2)))
  gimghm(c1, c0, c2)
  ghmgrp2(c1, c0, c2)
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  grpcl(c2, cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  f1ocnvfv2(c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)))
  iscmn(hs0, hs1, c2, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  isabl(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, co(c0, cgim, c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm abliso(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))→ c2 ∈ Abel)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2)), c2 ∈ Abel, c2 ∈ Grp, c2 ∈ CMnd)
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2)), c2 ∈ CMnd, c2 ∈ Mnd, ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c2),(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0))))
  syl((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2)), c2 ∈ Mnd, c2 ∈ Grp)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2), c2 ∈ Grp)
  grpmnd(c2)
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c2), (Base ` c2), (c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2)), (hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)=(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0))
  3eqtr3d((hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1), (hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0), (c1 `(`' c1 `(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1))), (c1 `(`' c1 `(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0))), ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))))
  fveq2d(c1, (`' c1 `(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)), (`' c1 `(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0)), ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))))
  3eqtr4d((`' c1 `(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)), (`' c1 `(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0)), ((`' c1 ` hs0)[(+ ` c0)](`' c1 ` hs1)), ((`' c1 ` hs1)[(+ ` c0)](`' c1 ` hs0)), ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))), ((`' c1 ` hs0)[(+ ` c0)](`' c1 ` hs1))=((`' c1 ` hs1)[(+ ` c0)](`' c1 ` hs0)), c0 ∈ Abel, (`' c1 ` hs0)∈(Base ` c0), (`' c1 ` hs1)∈(Base ` c0))
  simpll(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2)))
  ffvelrnd(`' c1, hs0, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c2), ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))))
  ffvelrnd(`' c1, hs1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c2), ((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2)), (`' c1 :(Base ` c2)→(Base ` c0)))
  3syl(c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2), (`' c1 :(Base ` c2)→(Base ` c0)), (c1 :(Base ` c0)↔(Base ` c2)), (`' c1 :(Base ` c2)↔(Base ` c0)))
  f1ocnv(c1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c2))
  f1of(`' c1, (Base ` c2), (Base ` c0))
  ablcom(c0, (`' c1 ` hs0), (Base ` c0), (`' c1 ` hs1), (+ ` c0))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))), (`' c1 `(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1))=((`' c1 ` hs0)[(+ ` c0)](`' c1 ` hs1)), `' c1 ∈(c2[GrpHom]c0), hs0 ∈(Base ` c2), hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))
  ghmlin(`' c1, c2, c0, hs0, (Base ` c2), hs1, (+ ` c2), (+ ` c0))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))), (`' c1 `(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0))=((`' c1 ` hs1)[(+ ` c0)](`' c1 ` hs0)), `' c1 ∈(c2[GrpHom]c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c2), hs0 ∈(Base ` c2))
  syl(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))), `' c1 ∈(c2[GrpHom]c0), `' c1 ∈(c2[GrpIso]c0))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2)), `' c1 ∈(c2[GrpIso]c0))
  gimcnv(c1, c0, c2)
  gimghm(`' c1, c2, c0)
  ghmlin(`' c1, c2, c0, hs1, (Base ` c2), hs0, (+ ` c2), (+ ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))), (c1 `(`' c1 `(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)))=(hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1), (c1 :(Base ` c0)↔(Base ` c2)), (hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)∈(Base ` c2))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))), (hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1)∈(Base ` c2), c2 ∈ Grp, hs0 ∈(Base ` c2), hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))
  grpcl(c2, hs0, (Base ` c2), hs1, (+ ` c2))
  f1ocnvfv2(c1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c2), (hs0[(+ ` c2)]hs1))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))), (c1 `(`' c1 `(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0)))=(hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0), (c1 :(Base ` c0)↔(Base ` c2)), (hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0)∈(Base ` c2))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2)), (c1 :(Base ` c0)↔(Base ` c2)))
  gimf1o(c1, c0, c2, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2))∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))), (hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0)∈(Base ` c2), c2 ∈ Grp, hs1 ∈(Base ` c2), hs0 ∈(Base ` c2))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ Abel, c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c2)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c2)), c2 ∈ Grp)
  syl(c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2), c2 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈(c0[GrpHom]c2))
  gimghm(c1, c0, c2)
  ghmgrp2(c1, c0, c2)
  simprr((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2)), hs0 ∈(Base ` c2), hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))
  simprl((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2)), hs0 ∈(Base ` c2), hs1 ∈(Base ` c2))
  grpcl(c2, hs1, (Base ` c2), hs0, (+ ` c2))
  f1ocnvfv2(c1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c2), (hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0))
  iscmn(hs0, hs1, c2, (Base ` c2), (+ ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  isabl(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2)))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈ Abel ∧ c1 ∈(c0[GrpIso]c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
